query: SELECT 'users' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM users UNION ALL SELECT 'activity_logs' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM file_activity_logs UNION ALL SELECT 'notif_prefs' as tbl, COUNT(*) as cnt FROM activity_notification_preferences
